General.Name: Maniker
General.Description: Maniker.Co.,Ltd engages in hatching, breeding, slaughtering, and processing of chickens. The company primarily produces and exports various frozen, refrigerated, and retort products, such as meat processed foods, smoked chicken, frozen cooked foods, and ham and sausages. It distributes its products through chicken specialty stores, department stores, hotels, direct management stores, and discount stores, as well as Internet or phone. The company was formerly known as DaeYun Food Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Maniker.Co.,Ltd in October 1998. The company was founded in 1962 and is based in Yongin-si, South Korea.
